          <title>
            <string language="sl">Ali veš?</string>
            <string language="en">Do you know?</string>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Wissen Sie?</string>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Savez-vous ?</string>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Você sabe?</string>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Sapete?</string>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Ξέρετε;</string>
            <string language="x-mt-es">¿Usted sabe?</string>
          </title>
          <language>sl</language>
          <description>
            <string language="sl">Izvirna datoteka Hot Potatoes, primerna za prilagajanje po svojih potrebah. Splošno znanje oz. podatki.</string>
            <string language="en">Set of quiz type questions in general knowledge. Hot Potatoes source code included.</string>
          </description>
          <keyword>
            <string language="sl">kviz</string>
            <string language="en">quiz</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="sl">zanimivost</string>
            <string language="en">interesting thing</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="sl">vprašanje</string>
            <string language="en">question</string>
          </keyword>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Set Quiztyp Fragen im Allgemeinwissen. Heißes 
Kartoffelquellenprogramm schloß ein.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Ensemble de type questions de jeu en général la 
connaissance. Code source chaud de pommes de terre inclus.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Jogo do tipo perguntas do quiz no conhecimento geral. 
O código de fonte quente das batatas incluiu.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Insieme del tipo domande di quiz nella conoscenza 
generale. Il codice sorgente caldo delle patate ha incluso.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Σύνολο ερωτήσεων τύπων διαγωνισμοου γνώσεων στη 
γενική γνώση. Καυτός κώδικας πηγής πατατών 
συμπεριλαμβανόμενος.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-es">Conjunto de tipo preguntas del concurso en conocimiento 
general. Código de fuente caliente de las patatas incluido.</string>
          </description>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Quiz</string>
          </keyword>
